short_description: sweeney rogers corp is an industrial air solutions company based in raynham, massachusetts, united states.
long_description: originally covering the six new england states, they placed an emphasis on engineering and technical expertise, specializing in commercial and residential heat and hot water solutions. an upstate new york office was added in 1999, expanding the company's footprint and setting the stage for further territory expansion. in 2010, src acquired the new england based frederick geraghty, inc.; a respected agency that had roots dating back to the 50's. with a strong emphasis on building relationships at the contractor, distributor and specifying engineer level, the srgi team is dedicated to their purpose of creating leaders from within the company that will benefit the plumbing heating and hvac community and beyond. srgi remains dedicated to our core values of customer service and technical support, seeking to fulfill our pledge of working on behalf of our manufacturers and customers by adding value to all the products we sell. both awards, "highest residential high-efficiency boiler growth partner" and "top growth partner" recognize srgi for outstanding efforts... read more.

generated_description: sweeney rogers geraghty inc. (srgi) is a manufacturer's representative firm based in raynham, massachusetts. founded in 1997 by peter sweeney, the company initially focused on commercial and residential heat and hot water solutions in the six new england states. in 2010, srgi acquired frederick geraghty, inc., a new england-based agency with roots dating back to the 1950s, expanding its product lines and footprint. in 2023, srgi further expanded its territory to include pennsylvania, southern new jersey, west virginia, maryland, delaware, and virginia through the acquisition of the jc mottinger agency. srgi is known for its technical expertise, customer service, and strong sales coverage across the specified regions. the company is led by a seasoned management team dedicated to building relationships with contractors, distributors, and specifying engineers, aiming to create leaders within the plumbing heating and hvac community.
